page.title: 09BARNSTON SCHOOL OUTINGS
page.content:
From September 1984 to July 1985 the children have been on several outings.These include;
ALL CHILDREN {Peter Pan;}a pantomime in Theatr Clwyd,Mold.{Martin Mere}a wildfowl sanctuary in Lancashire. UPPER JUNIORS {Speke Hall}a Tudor Mansion on the outskirts of Liverpool.{Styal Mill }a cotton mill museum near Manchester. {London,}Science and Natural History Museums,Tower and sightseeing. LOWER JUNIORS {Chester}tour of the walls.{Farm visits Canal history at{Ellesmere Port Boat {Museum.}Local{Land Cover Survey.} INFANTS {Chester Zoo.}A{train journey}from Heswall to Bidston return. {Liverpool Museum.}Local{road survey.
